predictions.text: American Express earnings will continue to show robust spending in various categories, with a confidence level of 80%.
Concerns about long-run inflation in the bond market will increase, with a confidence level of 70%.
Block's stock will continue to climb after entering the S&P 500, with a confidence level of 85%.
Microsoft will successfully remove reliance on Chinese engineers for Pentagon support, with a confidence level of 75%.
Trump's lawsuit against Murdoch over the WSJ story and request to unseal Epstein and Maxwell transcripts will face legal challenges, with a confidence level of 60%.
